name: OnVehicleStreamOut
notes: This callback can also be called by NPC.
versions: This callback was added in SA-MP 0.3a and will not work in earlier versions!
description: This callback is called when a vehicle is streamed out for a player's client (it's so far away that they can't see it).

params_body.name: vehicleid
params_body.description: The ID of the vehicle that streamed out.

params_body.name: forplayerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player who is no longer streaming the vehicle.

return_values: It is always called first in filterscripts.
related_cb:
OnVehicleStreamIn: Called when a vehicle streams in for a player.
 OnPlayerStreamIn: Called when a player streams in for another player.
 OnPlayerStreamOut: Called when a player streams out for another player.
